charges.charge_description: 18:2312 TRANSPORT ETC. STOLEN VEHICLES, AIRCRAFT-Transported in interstate commerce a stolen motor vehicle. 18:2 Aid and Abet (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of Bureau of Prisons for 30 months, tobe served consecutively to the Federal Parole Violation sentence that defendant is presently serving &; followed by 3 Years Sup. Release with special conditions that he participate in an alcohol and drug treatment program to include ruinalysis testing at the d irection of the U. S. Probation Officer. Defendant shall make partial restitution of $3, 600.00 in monthly payments of not less than $100.00 per month, which shall be remitted to Sears Consumer Financial Corp., 2500 Lake Cook Rd., River Woods, Il. 60015, Attn. Sandy Greenspan, Legal counsel. Defendant shall pay Special Assessment of $50.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:2313 TRANSPORT ETC. STOLEN VEHICLES, AIRCRAFT-Sold or disposed of a stolen motor vehicle which had crossed state boundary after being stolen 18:2 Aid and Abet (2)
